content:
IWSTrustChannelContract Interface

In this Article

A service contract that defines the methods that wrap the Message-oriented operation contracts exposed by IWSTrustChannelContract.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)]
[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract]
public interface IWSTrustChannelContract : System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustContract

Methods summary

BeginCancel(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.
BeginIssue(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
BeginRenew(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
BeginValidate(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Validate message to an endpoint.
Cancel(RequestSecurityToken)

Sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.
EndCancel(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginCancel*.
EndIssue(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginIssue*.
EndRenew(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginRenew*.
EndValidate(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginValidate*.
Issue(RequestSecurityToken)

Sends a WS-Trust Issue message to an endpoint STS.
Issue(RequestSecurityToken,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

Sends a WS-Trust Issue message to an endpoint STS.
Renew(RequestSecurityToken)

Sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.
Validate(RequestSecurityToken)

Sends a WS-Trust Validate message to an endpoint.

Methods

  • BeginCancel(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

    Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.

    public IAsyncResult BeginCancel (System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken request, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

    Parameters

    • request
      RequestSecurityToken

      The RequestSecurityToken that represents the request to the STS.

    • callback
      AsyncCallback

      An optional AsyncCallback delegate, to be called when the send is complete.

    • state
      Object

      A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.

    Returns

    • IAsyncResult

      An IAsyncResult object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.

  • BeginIssue(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

    Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.

    public IAsyncResult BeginIssue (System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken request, AsyncCallback callback, object asyncState);

    Parameters

    • request
      RequestSecurityToken

      The RequestSecurityToken that represents the request to the STS.

    • callback
      AsyncCallback

      An optional AsyncCallback delegate, to be called when the send is complete.

    • asyncState
      Object

      A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.

    Returns

    • IAsyncResult

      An IAsyncResult object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.

  • BeginRenew(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

    Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Renew message to an endpoint.

    Parameters

      The RequestSecurityToken that represents the request to the STS.

      AsyncCallback

      Object

      A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.

    Returns

      An IAsyncResult object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.

  • BeginValidate(RequestSecurityToken,AsyncCallback,Object)

    Asynchronously sends a WS-Trust Validate message to an endpoint.

    Parameters

      An optional AsyncCallback delegate, to be called when the send is complete.

    • state

      A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous send request from other requests.

      An IAsyncResult object that represents the asynchronous send, which could still be pending.

  • Cancel(RequestSecurityToken)

    Sends a WS-Trust Cancel message to an endpoint.

    public System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse Cancel (System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken request);

    Parameters

    • request
      RequestSecurityToken

      The RequestSecurityToken that represents the request to the STS.

    Returns

    • RequestSecurityTokenResponse

      The RequestSecurityTokenResponse that represents the STS response.

  • EndCancel(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

    Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginCancel*.

    public void EndCancel (IAsyncResult result, out System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse response);

    Parameters

    • result
      IAsyncResult

      A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.

    • response
      RequestSecurityTokenResponse

      The RequestSecurityTokenResponse that represents the STS response.

  • EndIssue(IAsyncResult,RequestSecurityTokenResponse)

    Completes the asynchronous send operation initiated by a call to stem.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrustChannelContract.BeginIssue*.

    public System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken EndIssue (IAsyncResult result, out System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse response);

    Parameters

      IAsyncResult

      A reference to the outstanding asynchronous send request.

    • response

      The RequestSecurityTokenResponse that represents the STS response.

    Returns

    • SecurityToken

      A SecurityToken that represents the token issued by the STS.
